name: Punch
text: Deal 4 damage to an adjacent target

name: Dodge
text: Damage you take is reduced by your LUCK until your next turn

name: Block
text: Physical Damage you take is reduced by half until your next turn

name: Longsword
text: You gain 'Minor Action: Deal 5 damage to an adjacent target'

name: Shield
text: Block Actions you take instead prevent all physical damage.
